text: The Trelawny Pitbulls were the Conference League team of the Trelawny Tigers speedway club.Bamford, R.(2004). Speedway Yearbook 2004. Stroud: Tempus Publishing The Pitbulls operated for one season in 2003 until the Trelawny Tigers promotion closed. The team entered the Conference Trophy. ==Notable riders== *Ben Barker *Malcolm Holloway ==References== Category:Defunct British speedway teams Category:Sport in Cornwall
title: Trelawny Pitbulls
